items.title: Tens of thousands queue to see Pope Francis's body
items.description: St Peter's Basilica had extended its opening hours to accommodate large crowds gathered outside.

items.title: Benin admits that 54 soldiers killed in attack by al-Qaeda group
items.description: This is the deadliest known attack since insurgents began operating in Benin at the beginning of the decade.

items.title: Tanzania bans South Africa and Malawi imports as trade row escalates
items.description: Tanzanian bananas are among the things hit in the dispute after Malawi stopped them from entering.

items.title: South Africa and Ukraine woo each other - as relationships with Trump turn sour
items.description: Volodymyr Zelensky is on a historic visit to South Africa to counter Russia's influence on the continent.

items.title: K-pop singer Bain of Just B comes out during US concert
items.description: The star is among only a handful of K-pop artists who have come out publicly.
